Module org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap.impl

Class DefaultBootstrapFactory

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap.impl.DefaultBootstrapFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
BootstrapFactory
public class DefaultBootstrapFactory extends Object implements BootstrapFactory
HTML factory which relies on Bootstrap styles and scripts.
Author:
Pavel

    • formGroup

      public FormGroup formGroup(Object label, Object input, Object hint, Map<Breakpoint,Size> horizontalLabelWidths)
      Specified by:
      formGroup in interface BootstrapFactory
      horizontalLabelWidths - If not null and not empty, a horizontal form group is created as explained here - https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.5/components/forms/#horizontal-form with label widths taken from the map and control widths computed as 12 - label width.
      Returns:
